title: Movie Picker
description: This project was probably my favorite. I have been wanting to make a random movie picker app from the start. I know there are a lot out there but none ever allowed me to sort by genre, ratings, and year. I use it all the time already. I put this together with React and Redux and surprised myself when it only took less than a day to get the functionality together.

title: RED Life
description: I was Git lead and team lead on this project we made for RED Academy. This is a full-stack social media application. Allowing students to get to know each other, vote for upcoming event themes, staff announcements or random posts. We used React and Meteor.js to build this in 2 weeks.

title: GTA Tooth Fairy
description: I was the Git lead for this project. We built a brand new website for the GTA Tooth Fairy. She is a dental hygienist that comes to you. I dabled in the dark arts of PHP on this one to build a WordPress theme.

title: Shopping Cart
description: Building this shopping cart is what made me realize how much I loved web developement. I used ES6 classes to make it from the ground up.

title: News App
description: I built this news app to allow me to view news I am interested in. It fetches data from the the New York Times API. I mostly used jQuery on this one.
